content.p: Thinking about applying for jobs for after you graduate? Power-up your search with MyCareer where employers advertise hundreds of vacancies from a variety of sectors. Login to MyCareer Unlock your potential with MyCareer where all the vacancies are directed at Nottingham students and graduates. We advertise around 4800 graduate vacancies every year and cover more than 30 career areas. Check out our selection of roles below. To see the full list of vacancies login to MyCareer. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
